snippet.title: Nusantara: Legend of the Winged Ones #4| Learning the Language....
snippet.description:
The day has started and everything is going good well until........
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks for Watching! ^_^
Game: http://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=36078
Game Synopsis: Long ago, when the world was still young and humans have just learned how to write, Legends of mythical beings traveled over the continents. Mysteries about the existence of Dragons, Griffins, Unicorns, and many other myths were told in folklores and heritages. Some even has human characteristics such as Centaurs, Lamias, Anubis, and Kinara Kinari. But there was one legend. Lost and much of it is forgotten. For none now lived to remember it. A legend about humans with wings and humans with skin tougher than steel. How they prospered and how they vanished without a trace. This is a story about... Birth, Death, Peace, War, And Love. How it all began from the gift of Blue Crystal. Both a blessing and a curse from the Goddess. And now, The Legend shall be unfolded by a human girl.
